overview: Get ready for a thrilling ride as the world's top surfers perform amazing feats of extreme athleticism as they catch some of the best waves around the globe in this high-octane program. Surfers include Kalani Robb, Andy Irons, Luke Egan, Chris Ward, Mick Fanning, Bobby Martinez and many others. The action is set to a soundtrack featuring songs by Green Day, the Hives, Earshot, the Exiles and more.
title: Because: White Knuckle Extreme
